info.title: Symphony 2.0 Object Model Chat Application Types

get.summary: Get the given entitlement for the given user. Returns 201 if the entitlement exist or 403 if not.

ThreadIdObject.description: The ID object for an SBE thread. Points to a Stream.

MessageIdObject.description: The ID object for an SBE message, messageType is the (fully qualified) TYPE_ID for the message type.

UserMessageIdObject.description: The ID object for a users interaction with an SBE message, messageType is the (fully qualified) TYPE_ID for the message type.

AttachmentMessageIdObject.description: The ID object for an SBE attachment download message, messageType is the (fully qualified) TYPE_ID for the message type.

BotCredential.description: A secret credential which a bot needs to bootstrap.

Presence.description: A livecurrent message as persisted in the DB.

ForwarderRequest.description: A livecurrent message as persisted in the DB.

MessageType.description: Taken from MessageType.java, obviously this is different in subtle ways from LiveCurrentMessageType.

LiveCurrentMessageType.description: Taken from Jackson annotations in ILiveCurrentMessage.java.

LiveCurrentMessage.description: A livecurrent message as persisted in the DB.

BaseSocialMaestroMessage.description: A BaseSocialMaestro message as persisted in the DB.

copyDisabled.description: This attribute is duplicated with isCopyDisabled, I think this may be a Jackson side effect caused by the fact that the getter is called isCopyDisabled and the setter is setIsCopyDisabled which is wrong, it should be setCopyDisabled.

#comment: The member variable is defined in SocialMessage but the getter is abstract in BaseSocialMessage so who knows

Entitlement.description: An entitlement as seen in SocialMessage.

Role.description: An entitlement as seen in SocialMessage.

#there seem to be different versions of: on the internalMsg topic as a JSON object.

MaestroUser.description: A Symphony maestro user based on IMaestroUser

active.description: Tells whether the user is active or not

connectGroup.description: The group that the user belongs to

focusedUser.description: Tells whether the user is focused or not

imageUrl.description: URL that points to the image

imageUrlSmall.description: URL that points to the small image

initials.description: The initials words of the user

screenName.description: What GS uses instead of username

username.description: The complete name of the user

isComplianceUser.description: Tells whether the user is a compliance user or not

isCrossPodUser.description: Tells whether the user is using Cross Pod or not

externalIMContact.description: Tells whether the user is an external IM contact or not

externalSMSContact.description: Tells whether the user is an external SMS contact or not

person.description: Tells whether the user is a person or not

isSuperUser.description: Tells whether the user is a super user or not

UserImageMetadata.description: Metadata of the user's images based on UserImageMetadata

UserPreferences.description: Preferences of the user based on IPreferences

MaestroUserEntitlement.description: An user entitlements as seen in IMaestroUser

#media: Unclear what this is, it looks like its for code snippets but seems to be deprecated.

DeleteEvent.description: Event to signal a message should be marked as deleted.

DownloadAttachmentEvent.description: Represents an event when a file attachment is downloaded.

LikedEvent.description: An event of a user liking a message.

DeliveryReceipt.description: Notification of the delivery to a client.

ReadReceipt.description: Notification from a client that a message was displayed.

HideStream.description: Stream hidden status change (indicates to the UI what to show).

StreamSettings.description: Stream settings change (indicates to the UI how to show).

RemoveBadgeCount.description: Notification of messages being read on another client.

RemoveMentionBadgeCount.description: Notification of something to do with mentions.

ResponsePayload.description: The response which would have come from the old message ingestion endpoint.

ObjectStatusMessage.description: A notification of the change in ingestion status of a submitted message.
#comment: In SBE this is a sun-class of LivecurrentMessage, containing a protobuf object, but the JSON which is output on datafeed
contains only the contents of the protobuf attribute. This schema maintains the sub-class of LivecurrentMessage but
also contains the attributes defined in the proto definition for the SBE message type.

ExchangeEnvelope.description: Envelope to wrap meta data around each payload sent through the system, and therefore should only contain transient data. The ExchangeEnvelope will be available to every component in the message bus, but SHOULD NOT be persisted outside of that.

MessengerBag.description: Logical grouping of a list of exchange envelopes by the message type.

ReceivedMessageBusMsg.description: Base class for the SBE message bus library wire formats.

SNSSQSWireObject.description: The SBE message bus library wire format for SnsSqs.

UnforwardableMessage.description: A message from a 1.X pod which we can't process'.

SharedUserInfo.description: The bits of a user record which may be shared with other users.

PrivateUserInfo.description: The bits of a user record which are not shared with other users.

Venue.description: A venue, chatroom, MIM or IM.

owner.description: If the member is owner of the room

copyDisabled.description: If members are allowed to copy message from stream

crossPod.description: If the stream is cross pod

externalOwned.description: If the streams belongs to other pod

publicRoom.description: If the stream is a public room

readOnly.description: If the stream is readonly, i.e. only creator can send messages to stream

meetingId.description: The id of the meeting associated with this stream, only used for meeting types

multiLateral.description: Stream belongs to more than one pod

ownerPodId.description: Id of the pod which created the stream

ownerPodName.description: Name of the pod which created the stream

podDistributionHistory.description: List of companies, in a xpod stream, which were or are member of this stream

podDistributionList.description: List of companies, in a xpod stream, which currently are member of this stream

shareHistoryEnabled.description: If new members can view history

largeStream.description: Tell whether is a large room or not

AuthenticationKey.description: Authentication Key of the user based on AuthenticationKey

UserEntitlementMap.description: An user entitlement map as seen in IMaestroUser

PodInitialization.description: A pod. The operating security context contains system config objects, the environment principal has access to this. The root context gives access to all content for the pod, the public context is visible to all principals in the pod but not the environment operating principal, this is where the forwarder puts forwarded messages.
